sentence.Network_en: Teachers often view youth workers as undisciplined and ineffectual.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师们常认为青少年工作者纪律性差且能力低下。

sentence.Network_en: In his view, the Commission remains a toothless and ineffectual body.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他看来，委员会仍然是一个没有实权、不起作用的机构。

sentence.Network_en: Our Intelligence Service was untrained, cumbersome, and almost wholly ineffectual.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的情报部门人员缺乏训练，机构臃肿，简直毫无用处。

list.abs: 无效... ... 9. The treaty has been declared void. 条约被宣布无效. 10. All rescue measures proved ineffectual. 抢救无效.

...台湾经济颓势，从一个万人景仰的政治明星，成为一个“无能的笨蛋(ineffectual bumbler)”。
台湾《醒报》称， 这篇文章的标题用“Ma the bumbler”（笨拙的马英九），内文用“没用的笨蛋”（ineffectual bumbler）。文中写的、 …
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(I) ... ineffectual 无效的 ineffectually 无效地 inefficacious 无效力的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from medieval Latin ineffectualis, from in- 'not' + effectualis, from Latin effectus (see effect); in later use from in- 'not' + effectual

entry.tran: 不起作用的;徒劳无益的
entry.def: If someone or something is ineffectual, they fail to do what they are expected to do or are trying to do.

example.ex: The mayor had become ineffectual in the struggle to clamp down on drugs.
example.tran: 市长打击毒品的努力未见成效。

example.ex: ...the well-meaning but ineffectual jobs programs of the past.
example.tran: 过去的一些出发点很好但却无成效的就业计划

means.word_mean: 1. not sufficient to produce a desired result;

sentences.sentence: "an ineffectual effort to block the legislation"
"like an unable phoenix in hot ashes"

auth_sentence.content: They may consider him imperious or ineffectual or wrong.

auth_sentence.content: He is remembered as an ineffectual, neglectful and brutal leader.

means.word_mean: 效果不佳的, 无效果的, 不起作用的

sentences.en: He won’t be able to deal with the situation;he’s too ineffectual.
sentences.cn: 他无法应付局面, 他太无能了。
